words.defineEn: the use of tricks to deceive someone (usually to extract money from them)
words.defineVi: việc sử dụng các mánh khóe để lừa dối ai đó (thường là để lấy tiền từ họ)

words.defineEn: free of deceit
words.defineVi: không lừa dối

examples: I believe politics is the peaceable resolution of conflict among legitimate competing interests.
I believe politics is the peaceable resolution of conflict among legitimate competing interests.
words.defineEn: inclined or disposed to peace
words.defineVi: thiên về hòa bình

examples: Winter brings a peaceful silence, especially after a fresh snowfall.
She lived a very peaceful life.
He enjoys the peaceful atmosphere of his home.
I usually have a peaceful sleep at night.
The once peaceful beach town has now become completely commercialised.
words.defineEn: without any conflict, violence, or war
words.defineVi: không có xung đột, bạo lực hay chiến tranh

words.defineEn: lacking in feeling or pity or warmth
words.defineVi: thiếu cảm giác hay sự thương hại hay sự ấm áp

words.defineEn: the trait of being willing to undertake things that involve risk or danger
words.defineVi: đặc điểm sẵn sàng đảm nhận những việc liên quan đến rủi ro hoặc nguy hiểm

examples: So turtles are pretty hardy!

That's hardy man.
Hardy was 56 years old.
And they’re amazingly hardy.
words.defineEn: having rugged physical strength; inured to fatigue or hardships
words.defineVi: có thể lực dẻo dai; quen với sự mệt mỏi hoặc khó khăn

examples: We'll just have to play it by ear until we can get something definite sorted out.
I want that definite answer.
The war had a definite cause: unbridled military expansion by Germany, Japan, and, to a small extent, Italy.
She's definite, definite.
She's definite, definite.
words.defineEn: fixed, clear and obvious
words.defineVi: cố định, rõ ràng và rõ ràng

examples: In 1929 Edwin Hubble's astronomy observations gave us a definitive answer.
- All right, that was pretty definitive.
He wrote the definitive book on Tesla's life.
Of course, one study isn’t definitive proof of a phenomenon.
Likewise, Homo erectus began its excursions out of Africa hundreds of thousands of years before the first definitive evidence of widespread fire use.
words.defineEn: providing a final or ultimate solution or answer
words.defineVi: cung cấp một giải pháp hoặc câu trả lời cuối cùng hoặc cuối cùng

examples: That will obviously inure to the benefit of community colleges and to families.

words.defineEn: cause to accept or become hardened to; habituate
words.defineVi: nguyên nhân để chấp nhận hoặc trở nên cứng rắn; quen thuộc

words.defineEn: made tough by habitual exposure
words.defineVi: làm cho khó khăn bằng cách tiếp xúc theo thói quen

words.defineEn: of a substance, especially a strong acid; capable of destroying or eating away by chemical action
words.defineVi: của một chất, đặc biệt là axit mạnh; có khả năng phá hủy hoặc ăn mòn bằng tác động hóa học

words.defineEn: biting or given to biting
words.defineVi: cắn hoặc cắn

examples: Sorry, "A little while back, I learned from an eminent cardiologist that half of all patients first report heart disease to their doctors by dropping dead."
It was one of thousands of communities where land was taken by eminent domain to build the Interstate Highway System, approved in 1956 and by far the largest infrastructure project in U.S. history.
So he gathered all of the historical evidence he could on eminent British men and their descendants, and indeed found that eminence seemed to decrease over time.
This is the basis of what’s called eminent domain, which is fascinating but I don’t have time to go into it here.
words.defineEn: of imposing height; especially standing out above others
words.defineVi: chiều cao ấn tượng; đặc biệt nổi bật hơn những người khác

examples: So he gathered all of the historical evidence he could on eminent British men and their descendants, and indeed found that eminence seemed to decrease over time.
words.defineEn: high status importance owing to marked superiority
words.defineVi: tầm quan trọng địa vị cao do tính ưu việt rõ rệt

examples: And typically those were rote memory tasks, and only small improvements, and maybe only for some people who were recorded.
The ability to distinguish this importance makes elephant memory a complex and adaptable faculty beyond rote memorization.
Instead of experiencing common rote learning, with large doses of religious and classical reading, Emile learns carpentry, and gardening, and other practical skills.
And Brillilant’s Statistics 1 course teaches you all the essentials without resorting to tests and rote memorization.

words.defineEn: memorization by repetition
words.defineVi: ghi nhớ bằng cách lặp lại

examples: - Rotary machines are pretty easy to understand.

words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc đặc trưng bởi luân chuyển

examples: This rotund, barrel-like belly is on full display in the early herbivorous pelycosaur Cotylorhynchus, whose body dwarfed its tiny head.

words.defineEn: spherical in shape
words.defineVi: hình cầu

examples: But now, the goverment is deporting my family.

words.defineEn: to force a foreigner to leave a country, usually because they have broken the law
